", "answer": "The self-declaration covers ownership, subsidy history, family members' details, usage of the Canoe, absence of fishing vessel registration, and non-default status. 

"}, {"question": "What role does the Inspection Report play, and what details does it encompass? ", "answer": "The Inspection Report includes details on the Canoe's registration, owner, fishing details, engine, nets, life-saving equipment, ice box, and overall status.
